summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 LEXUS ES350. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V006000 (AIR BAGS) EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR REPAIR. THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION IN JANUARY OF 2017. THE DEALER (PARK PLACE LEXUS GRAPEVINE, 901 E STATE HWY 114, GRAPEVINE, TX 76051) STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE FOR REPAIR AND THAT THEY WERE WORKING ON THE 2010 MODELS. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE 2012 MODELS MAY NOT BE REPAIRED UNTIL OCTOBER 2017. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
